channel.title: Adding teleporter npcs, adding mapdata help? [508]
channel.description: hey, ive been coding a 508 bubly source [berkyscape] for about 2 weeks now... im trying to make a teleporter npc that teles you to differnet training areas? can anyone help me, i know how to spawn the npc but i do not know how to add dialogue when u click it u tele? also im looking to make some new areas like a staff and donator only area. but where i want to put it the mapdata is missing? how do i add new mapdata? thank you
